title: New to Typophile
content:
Now that I've joined this group...

I feel a lot more like I do now, than I did before I joined.

Comments welcome!

Rob
author: TypeSETit

comments.content: Even if I've just reaaally discovered typography only a few months ago, I feel barely the same, as I joined yesterday.

Thanks for the welcome...

I've been doing font development for a long time, and selling my work for a few years. I'm just now feeling like I need to get serious with it ( I feel like I have been faking it really well for a while ). So, I bought Fontlab last week because Fontographer (which I've been using since 1988 has its limitations), and I feel overwhelmed. Yet, I'm excited to know that I have so much more to learn.

I'm hoping that people in this group, can help me learn. I have a host of technical questions. But for now, I just want to say I'm looking forward to checking in frequently.

R
Oh, wow, a nice hello to you, Mr. Leuschke. I adore your calligraphic work. Nice to see you here.

Hi Rob, I've been a big fan of your calligraphy too. I get lots of ID requests for fonts that you've done, and we get posts here with your work a lot. Glad to see you among us. Welcome.

- Mike Yanega
Being from St. Paul, I have to applaud the Wild work you did. ;o)
